title: Rituals Duft-Set The Ritual of Ayurveda Set, 4-tlg.
description: Tolle Angebote und Top Qualität entdecken - CO2 neutraler Versand ✔ Kauf auf Rechnung und Raten ✔ Erfülle dir deine Wünsche bei OTTO!
text:
|Menge in Millilitern||200 ml|
|Inhaltsstoffe||The Ritual of Ayurveda Candle 145g: Linalool; A-Hexylcinnamaldehyde; Cis-4-Tert-Butylcyclohexyl Acetate; Citronellol; 1-(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8-Octahydro-2,3,8,8-Tetramethyl-2-Naphthyl)Ethan-1-One; 3-Methyl-4-(2,6,6-Trimethyl-2-Cyclohexen-1-Yl)-3-Buten-2-One; (Ethoxymethoxy)Cyclododecane; (E)-1-(2,6,6-Trimethyl-1,3-Cyclohexadien-1-Yl)-2-Buten-1-One; Oxacyclohexadecan-2-One. The Ritual of Ayurveda Foaming Shower Gel: Aqua/Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Isopentane, Sorbitol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Parfum/Fragrance, Isobutane, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate. The Ritual of Ayurveda Body Cream 100ml: Aqua/Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Hybrid Oil, Undecane, Tridecane, Mel (Honey), Tocopheryl Acetate, Allantoin, Tocopherol, Ubiquinone, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Cetyl Palmitate, Ceteareth-20, Glyceryl Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Isohexadecane, Carbomer, Sodium Poly-acrylate, Ceteareth-12, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Coumarin, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid|
